name: Death Wish (James Bradford)
description:
An incomplete game made for a Middle School science fair. Literally just 1 level. You choose 1 of 3 ships to pilot through an asteroid field while Mission Impossible music plays in the background.

Actually kind of fun, and I remember my high school physics teacher actually beat the level (after several attempts) LOL.

note: only "1-player" works on menu, 2-player kind-of works but will take you to a level where all asteroids are invisible (lol, so unplayable).

Just use arrow keys to play.
